definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: He is an hour late -- He can have been delayed by fog.
sentences.chinese: 他迟到了一小时，可能由于大雾而担搁了。

sentences.english: Airplanes grounded because of the fog have already taken off.
sentences.chinese: 受到大雾影响而停飞的班机已全部复航。

sentences.english: Another foggy morning in Chengdu –the weather of this season.
sentences.chinese: 又一个大雾的成都早晨，这个季节就是这种天气。

sentences.english: All the flights are delayed becaU3e of the heavy fog.
sentences.chinese: 趼有的航班都因为这场大雾延误了。

sentences.english: Because of a dense fog in Anshun, our plane landed in Guiyang instead.
sentences.chinese: 由于安顺大雾，飞机临时改降贵阳。

sentences.english: Sometimes a mist seemed to be falling, and sometimes there was a sudden downpour of heavy, slanting rain.
sentences.chinese: 一忽儿像是下大雾，突然间又下起倾盆大雨。

sentences.english: Epiphyllous liverworts of Daiwu Shan, Jiulong (Kowloon).
sentences.chinese: 九龙大雾山的叶附生苔类植物。

sentences.english: All aircraft at London Airport were grounded by fog yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天由于大雾伦敦机场所有飞机停飞。

sentences.english: Due to the heavy fog, the flight will be cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 由于大雾天气，本次航班将取消。

sentences.english: Fortunately, the plane's landing was delayed because of fog.
sentences.chinese: 幸运地是飞机的着陆因为大雾而延迟了。

sentences.english: You any kin to the Wilsons over on Balsum Mountain?
sentences.chinese: 你是大雾山威尔逊的什么亲戚吗？

sentences.english: His eyes were fixed on the place where the path disappeared into the fog.
sentences.chinese: 他的双眼直勾勾地盯着这条小路被大雾遮没之处。
大雾把山水景色笼罩了个严实。

sentences.english: Several cars piled up after ignoring the fog warning on the motorway.
sentences.chinese: 由于无视高速公路上的大雾警告，有好几辆汽车相撞。

sentences.english: The airport was fog bound so no aircraft could takeoff.
sentences.chinese: 机郴大雾笼罩著，所以飞机都不能起飞。

sentences.english: He ean have been delayed by fog.
sentences.chinese: 他可能被大雾外教口语陪练所耽误了。

definition: Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
(of mist, snow, floodwater etc) a vast expanse of whiteness
